content.rendered:
Since joining the Johnson Consulting Group, we have implemented the web based accounting system and several management enhancement programs. Our receivables now average 15 days – call volume increased 20 percent – revenue per call has increased and our staffs’ attitudes and morale have never better. It has totally changed our perspective.

– Ed and Shawn Murphy of Phoenix, Arizona
